verses.roman:
sūtra-upaniṣadera mukhyārtha chāḍiyā
ācārya 'kalpanā' kare āgraha kariyā

synonyms: sūtra-upaniṣadera—of the Vedānta-sūtra and the Upaniṣads; mukhya-artha—the direct meaning; chāḍiyā—giving up; ācārya—Śaṅkarācārya; kalpanā—imagination; kare—does; āgraha kariyā—with great eagerness.
translation: "Giving up the direct meaning of the Vedānta-sūtra and the Upaniṣads, Śaṅkarācārya imagines some other interpretation.
